column4: Hi. Does anyone know how well 8.04LTS runs on an Acer Aspire 4720Z?
So, SPYderZ, you're saying don't even bother trying?
its not the OS.. the OS will install
but Acer laptops come with theese cheap processors... they are POWERFULL... but the heat up really fast... and where I work pleople come with Acers weakly to get them fixed
